name: Survey Team IV and the derelict factory
name_original: Survey Team IV and the derelict factory
description:
In a far flung corner of the galaxy, Survey Team IV has reached their next destination: A derelict factory, last operational during the Great Wars, and long forgotten to all but a few scholars and bureaucrats.

Forgotten perhaps, but not asleep, as the factory shows clear signs of operation

Sync into your exploration frame, and venture forth into the factory and seek what lies at the heart

Features
- An entire level filled with danger to explore
- 2 whole different enemies
- Customize your capabilities by dynamically assinging power to 3 different subsystem
- a challenging boss battle to cap it off

Context
This was a small project done solo over 3 months, with the main goal of learning how to implement and manage several game mechanics I hadn't tackled yet. I ended up liking it enough to publish it here as well.
If you're interested in the source code, I keep it on a public repository (it's developed in GameMaker 2): https://github.com/SamuelHuylebroeck/ScifiRPG
